text: Dana Bumgardner (born May 16, 1954) is a Republican member of the North Carolina General Assembly.http://votesmart.org/candidate/biography/136382/dana- bumgardner#.VWvZpGTBzGc He represents the 109th district. ==References== Category:Living people Category:North Carolina Republicans Category:21st- century American politicians Category:1954 births
title: Dana Bumgardner
